message.poetry: This poem is Dickinson’s most famous and most defense of the kind of spiritual privacy she favored, implying that to be a Nobody is a luxury incomprehensible to a dreary somebody—for they are too busy keeping their names in circulation. But to be somebody is not as fancy as it seems to be.
First love is unforgettable all one's life. 初恋是永生难忘的。
Love's tongue is in the eyes. 爱情的话语全在双眼之中。
n love folly is always sweet. 恋爱中，干傻事总是让人感到十分美妙。
There is no hiding from lover's eyes. 什么也瞒不过恋人的眼睛。
The only present love demands is love. 爱所祈求的唯一礼物就是爱。
The heart that once truly loves never forgets. 真挚恋爱过的心永不忘却。
Love warms more than a thousand fires. 爱情的炽热胜过千万团的火。
